predicate.note: Frames file for 'repeal' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Thus , with one brief passage in an appropriations bill , Congress repeals the president 's power [*] to make recess appointments under Article II .
example.arg: with one brief passage in an appropriations bill
the president 's power [*] to make recess appointments under Article II
